dillon.gameEngine.core

Class CanvasController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • dillon.gameEngine.core.CanvasController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CanvasController
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is in control of the game's canvas.
    Author:
    Dillon - Github dg092099
    See Also:

      • blackout

        public static void blackout(java.awt.Color bck,
            java.lang.String text,
            java.lang.String fontName,
            int fontSize,
            java.awt.Color fontColor)
        This blacks out the screen with many parameters. The text can be dismissed by using enter. The engine will not broadcast event ticks while this is active.
        Parameters:
        bck - The background color
        text - The text to display
        fontName - The name of the font to use.
        fontSize - The Size of the font to use.
        fontColor - The color of the text.
